titles.title: To amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to allow foreign trade zones to be established where a regional commission involving more than one State will coordinate zone activities.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1310)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to authorize a regional commission to establish a foreign-trade zone in two or more States if certain requirements are met.
